edge: Vishal Dadlani, the composer of the music, provides an acapella version of the title track 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap' sung by Amitabh Bachchan.
Vishal Dadlani, the composer of the music, provides a dub step version of the title track 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap' sung by Amitabh Bachchan and Vishal Dadlani.
The songs 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap' and 'Haal-E-Dil' both feature lyrics written by Swanand Kirkire and Anvita Dutt Guptan.
The songs 'Go Meera Go' and 'Bbuddah Hoga Terra Baap' both feature vocals by Amitabh Bachchan.
The songs 'Main Chandigarh Di Star' and 'Go Meera Go' both feature vocals by Sunidhi Chauhan.
The songs 'Haal-E-Dil' and 'Go Meera Go' both feature vocals by Amitabh Bachchan and Monali Thakur.
